Deep inside the ancient ship called the Ark, most of the power has been shu=
t down into power conservation mode. Much of the ship's systems have been r=
eturned to either a defensive mode, turned down so low so that millions of =
years from now the Autobots and Decepticons that rest here in in's heart wi=
ll have the power to reawaken when the time comes. 

However off to one sid=
e, inside one of the repair pods chambers, one that could possible have hou=
sed one of the tape sized transformers a dim light blinks. It's a light tha=
t had been blinking for quite some time, slowly, over the course of several=
 months shifting from a crimson red, to an amber, then yellow, and now for =
the first time it blinks once and then turns a steady green. 

A pop and hi=
ss can be heard as the door of the pod clicks and then slides to the side. =
Inside the repair pod the cold cyclopean visage of its singular inhabitant =
can be just made out as smoke and other repair fumes escape from the chambe=
r and into the air of the surrounding room. The occupant's single optic bli=
nks as the figure comes online and then gleams a stead crimson hue as the f=
igure jerks once and awakens fully.

The deck plating clanks as the figure =
steps out and looks around, taking a moment to get its bearings. Everything=
 appears to be alright, its crimson gaze seeming to pierce the darkness of =
this chamber with ease. 

A few steps takes the figure to a control panel t=
hat is posiioned off to one side. One that is obviously ot part of the orig=
inal construction, but has only been put here more recently. With a few def=
t touches it lights up and with startling speed information began to scroll=
 across it. A recording of an Autobot transmission has been recorded, as we=
ll as strange sensor recordings that may possibly be minion activity. 

"Gr=
eetings Autobots and Maximals" a cold voice transmited itself dually across=
 Maximal and Autobot encrypted communication lines. "This is Legacy, and I =
have reawakened. Do you require assistance?"

<TAG>

Preston
(Legacy)

OOC:=
 please note that many of the Maximals/Autobots that participated in the bi=
g minion battle that happened at the ark (about a year ago Real Time) may r=
emember Legacy, how he appeared seeming to know many strange things about p=
eople, protected the Ark, was badly damaged in its defense and has not been=
 heard from . . . until now.
